name: News
samplePrompt: Summarize the selected headlines into a 120-word brief.

chunks.title: 1991: World Wide Web Opens to the Public
chunks.body: Tim Berners-Lee’s creation becomes publicly available, setting the stage for a global information network.

chunks.title: 1992: Maastricht Treaty Establishes the European Union
chunks.body: European leaders sign a treaty deepening political and economic integration across member states.

chunks.title: 1994: Mandela Elected President in South Africa’s First All-Race Vote
chunks.body: Historic election ends apartheid rule; international reactions hail a new era of reconciliation.

chunks.title: 1997: IBM’s Deep Blue Defeats World Chess Champion
chunks.body: Milestone for computing as machine intelligence overcomes a reigning human champion in a match.

chunks.title: 1999: Y2K Countdown Spurs Global Readiness
chunks.body: Organizations rush to remediate systems ahead of the year 2000 rollover amid widespread concern.
